meanings.definition: Provide (food, drink, or other goods) for sale.
meanings.sent1: The local bakery purveyed freshly baked bread every morning.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store purveyed a wide variety of fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel purveyed acorns to the other animals in exchange for shiny pebbles.
meanings.sent4: Her smile purveyed warmth and kindness to everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly brewed coffee purveyed through the entire house.

meanings.sent1: The kind neighbor purveyed blankets and food to the homeless during the cold winter.
meanings.sent2: The company purveyed laptops to all its employees for remote work.
meanings.sent3: The magician purveyed endless entertainment to the children at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: His words purveyed comfort to her troubled heart.
meanings.sent5: The sun purveyed light and warmth to the garden, helping the flowers grow.
